activities.loc: Branch 2 Courtroom, 2nd Floor, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Theron M. Reese

records.addlTxt: 3:14 PM Defendant Theron M. Reese not in court. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Schiek requests warrant be authorized. Court authorizes warrant. adj. 03:15 PM

3:06 PM Judge Mary Burns mentoring with Judge Neal Nielsen. Defendant Theron M. Reese in court.  Attorney Michael Schiek in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant notes he is waiting for public defender appointment; has been in contact but no call back. Court advises defendant to continue to contact PD office. Schiek statement. Defendant statement. Bond continued. adj. 3:09 p.m.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report

2:34 PM Defendant Theron M. Reese in court. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court states PD has not appointed counsel yet - still searching. Bond continued. adj. 02:36 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report

2:53 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Theron M. Reese in court. Defendant states PD's office has not appointed counsel yet. Defendant states he is not employed. Bond continued. adj. 02:54 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report

3:31 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Theron M. Reese in court. 
PD has not yet appointed counsel.  Court will put over. 
Bail continued
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Defendant statement to items seized - would like back for upcoming camping trip -  Pfeifer statement - may contact RPD..

1:42 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Theron M. Reese in court. Court review of case - questions Defendant on non-appearance. Pfeifer statement to bond. Court reinstates bond. Defendant states he is eligible for PD. adj. 01:45 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

3:04 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Theron M. Reese not in court. Court review of case. Schiek has not had any contact - requests warrant be authorized. Court authorizes warrant. adj. 03:04 PM

1:53 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Theron M. Reese appeared by video, in custody. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Defendant states he is not on probation. Pfeifer statement to bail. Court questions Defendant if he knows victim/employment/residence. Defendant provides current address. Court sets bond. adj. 01:57 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
